H0.text: In which country did the Battle of El Alamein take place. Libya

H1.text: In which country did the Battle of El Alamein take place. Tunisia

H2.text: In which country did the Battle of El Alamein take place. Algeria

H3.text: In which country did the Battle of El Alamein take place. EGY

A4.text: The battles occurred during the North African campaign in Egypt, in and around an area named after a railway stop called El Alamein.
